description: This file defines a React hook called useTripStore that manages local state related to a trip's lifecycle in a rideshare application. It includes states for trip details, status, driver info, ETA, route, and WebSocket reference, along with a cleanup effect for WebSocket disconnection.

methods.name: useTripStore()
methods.description: A custom React hook that provides state management for trip lifecycle details, including trip info, status, driver, ETA, route, and WebSocket reference.
